name: SantaTime
description:
Experience the thrill of Santa's Christmas Eve rush to deliver gifts before the dawn of Christmas Day, using his special ability to stop time: "SantaTime"!

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #16, with the theme "Short on Time".  I learned about the nine-day-long jam with four days remaining, and having never used Godot before it seemed like the perfect theme to give it a try.

Game and Art by Joseph Davies and Richard Davies.

Controls:

  • Arrows: Move Santa/Fly Sleigh
  • H: Laugh
  • Space/Enter: Interact with nearby objects (including mounting/dismounting the sleigh, ascending/descending the chimney, or landing the sleigh)
  • S: SantaTime!
